intro: Computer and Information Technology degrees are among the popular courses. Students learn the skills and knowledge, including the study of computers, networks, computer language databases, new technology, web design, application development, and many more.  Information Technology course is designed to develop the professionals who not just develop software and systems but are also able to develop creative and innovative technologies for the modern world.  The increasing demand for computer and information technology graduates in the business and economic area is expanding. Graduates will gain both theoretical and practical skills needed in the enterprise. The course will produce graduate creative thinkers, innovators, and solution-oriented required for both the national and international arena.
